description: Number of fixed polyominoes with n cells.
comments: This sequence counts only polyominoes that are strictly 2-dimensional - it excludes those where all the squares are in a single line. Thus for n>1, a(n) = A001168(n) - 2. - Franklin T. Adams-Watters, Jul 29 2007
references: W. F. Lunnon, Counting multidimensional polyominoes. Computer Journal 18 (1975), no. 4, pp. 366-367.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
crossrefs: Cf. A001168. A column of A195739.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
